text: 11 Oct 2024 New Space Opera Science Fiction Reads Ready to embark on an interstellar adventure? Our latest selection features thrilling new space opera reads that will transport you to distant galaxies and beyond. With epic battles, complex characters, and imaginative worlds, these stories promise to ignite your imagination and keep you on the edge of your seat. Whether you’re a seasoned space opera fan or new to the genre, these captivating tales are sure to launch you into a world of excitement. Starship’s Mage, 10th Anniversary Edition (Book 1) by Glynn Stewart Release Date: October 8 2024 In 2014, Glynn Stewart blended sci-fi and magic in a saga where humanity reaches the stars—by magic. Tensions rise between aristocratic Mages that make this high tech future possible and everyone else, and a young man’s struggle to find work as a Jump Mage might just light the fire. The 10th Anniversary Edition of Book 1 is perfect for new readers. Buy on Amazon Redline Corps: Expendable by Rachel Aukes Release Date: October 8 2024 Join the fight for humanity in the start of this new alien invasion military sci-fi series by Rachel Aukes, bestselling author of Flight of the Javelin and Space Troopers. The enemy is vicious. Hope seems lost. But a few brave heroes can turn the tide. Humanity will prevail! Buy on Amazon The Meteor 2 by Joshua T. Calvert Release Date: September 28 2024 But in her home country, no one seems to realize how great the danger really is – and she has no way of sending messages from the sealed-off zone or escaping the Russian government’s attempt to destroy the entire area. Buy on Amazon To Homeschool On Mars by E. M. Foner Release Date: September 30 2024 Will the Bookers find that they’ve made the right choice for themselves and a community back on Earth depending on them? And just how far does the control of Earth’s superintelligence extend? Buy on Amazon Last Stop (The Diamond Knife Book 1) by Django Wexler Release Date: October 8 2024 But when the Last Stop is enlisted to search for a lost expedition that may have discovered a haven for humans beneath the Layer, it’s the chance of a lifetime. What awaits Zham and team at the end of this dangerous mission might just change their lives—and their world—forever. Then again, it might mean the end of both. Buy on Amazon The Portal 3 (Portal to Xibalbá) by Brandon Q. Morris Release Date: September 15 2024 Can Tyler and Adriana save their new friends on the other side of the portal – and save their home planet from invasion at the same time? Buy on Amazon meghan Recommended Posts
html:
11 Oct 2024

New Space Opera Science Fiction Reads

Ready to embark on an interstellar adventure? Our latest selection features thrilling new space opera reads that will transport you to distant galaxies and beyond. With epic battles, complex characters, and imaginative worlds, these stories promise to ignite your imagination and keep you on the edge of your seat. Whether you’re a seasoned space opera fan or new to the genre, these captivating tales are sure to launch you into a world of excitement.

Starship’s Mage, 10th Anniversary Edition (Book 1)

by Glynn Stewart

Release Date: October 8 2024

In 2014, Glynn Stewart blended sci-fi and magic in a saga where humanity reaches the stars—by magic. Tensions rise between aristocratic Mages that make this high tech future possible and everyone else, and a young man’s struggle to find work as a Jump Mage might just light the fire. The 10th Anniversary Edition of Book 1 is perfect for new readers.

Buy on Amazon

Redline Corps: Expendable

by Rachel Aukes

Release Date: October 8 2024

Join the fight for humanity in the start of this new alien invasion military sci-fi series by Rachel Aukes, bestselling author of Flight of the Javelin and Space Troopers. The enemy is vicious. Hope seems lost. But a few brave heroes can turn the tide. Humanity will prevail!

Buy on Amazon

The Meteor 2

by Joshua T. Calvert

Release Date: September 28 2024

But in her home country, no one seems to realize how great the danger really is – and she has no way of sending messages from the sealed-off zone or escaping the Russian government’s attempt to destroy the entire area.

Buy on Amazon

To Homeschool On Mars

by E. M. Foner

Release Date: September 30 2024

Will the Bookers find that they’ve made the right choice for themselves and a community back on Earth depending on them? And just how far does the control of Earth’s superintelligence extend?

Buy on Amazon

Last Stop (The Diamond Knife Book 1)

by Django Wexler

Release Date: October 8 2024

But when the Last Stop is enlisted to search for a lost expedition that may have discovered a haven for humans beneath the Layer, it’s the chance of a lifetime. What awaits Zham and team at the end of this dangerous mission might just change their lives—and their world—forever. Then again, it might mean the end of both.

Buy on Amazon

The Portal 3 (Portal to Xibalbá)

by Brandon Q. Morris

Release Date: September 15 2024

Can Tyler and Adriana save their new friends on the other side of the portal – and save their home planet from invasion at the same time?

Buy on Amazon
